topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Launch a Console Window

body.p: You can use the Helion dashboard to launch a console session to an instance.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances link.
In the Instances screen, for the instance you want to modify, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Console.
You might need to click through messages granting permission to access the console.
Log in with the appropriate user name and password.
